subject: AI & Agents
title: GPT-3: Scale Changes Everything
description: A quick win: understand GPT-3: Scale Changes Everything.

hook.text: A model with 175 billion parameters writes a compelling essay about AI consciousness. It was never taught to.

buildup.text: OpenAI's GPT-3 showed that massive scale produces qualitatively new capabilities.

discovery.text: Few-shot learning emerged: show GPT-3 a few examples and it performs tasks it was never explicitly trained for.

twist.text: Nobody predicted that language modeling alone ‚Äî next-word prediction ‚Äî would produce such abilities.

climax.text: GPT-3's API spawned hundreds of startups and changed how the world thinks about AI.

punchline.text: Predict the next word a trillion times and something remarkable happens.

quiz.question: What emergent ability surprised researchers about GPT-3?
options: It could perform new tasks from just a few examples without retraining
It could browse the internet in real time
It was the first model to generate text
